code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";function useActiveSection(sectionIds){const[activeSection,setActiveSection]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{let activeId="";for(const id of sectionIds){const section=document.getElementById(id);if(!section)continue;const top=section.getBoundingClientRect().top;const isVisible=top>=0&&top<=window.innerHeight*0.5;if(isVisible){activeId=id;break;}}if(activeId){setActiveSection(activeId);}};handleScroll();window.addEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);};},[sectionIds,setActiveSection]);return activeSection;}export{useActiveSection};
